originalText.text: I've taken all four of my kids through the neuropsyc process...let me tell you it's a LONG, tedious, redundant, process. But the end result is worth it. The eval is very very useful for school recommendactions anywhere else you go a neuropsyc eval is around 5 grand or there's a waitlist this study gives you one for free and even compensates you with amazon gift cards. I do not regret doing it at all , the eval is 50 pages long and it's extremely useful to learn your child's strengths and weaknesses and what you can do to help them as well as what needs to be put in place in the school for them to succeed. I'd do it again and I did it four times all at the same time as a solo parent. So grateful üôè

originalText.text: Child Mind is an amazing organization this location has a wonderful caring professional staff of intake people  and clinicians. They make everyone feel so welcomed from the front desk on‚Ä¶ every phone call is returned and email. They truly work as a team and care so much about the children and families. Their research and professionalism is not to be matched. We are so lucky to live in a city which offers this research. A huge thank you for the staff.

originalText.text: Worst parenting decision I have ever made was taking my child to the healthy brain network.
